channel.title: Chaotic Dream || 100% Dungeoneering & Summoning || Eco/Pk
channel.description:
Chaotic Dream
Website: <snip />
Download the client from the Forums!
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/827/airguitarz.jpg/][IMG]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/6576/airguitarz.jpg[/img][/URL]
- Friendly Players
- Eco/Pk server
- All Chaotics, Primal, Nex armours!
- New torva
- New Royal Armour
- Full Ganodermic/Polypore Staff
- Working Korasi
- Working Claws
- Custom Phats/H'weens
Bosses
- All Godwars (except Zamorak)
- Corporal Beast
- Tormented Demons (Dragon Claws drops from them)
- KBD
- Dagannoth Kings
- Nomad
- Sea Troll Queen
- Giant Sea Snake
- Avatar of destruction
- lakhrahnaz (new Chaos elemental i think)
- Working Donor Shop
- PKP Store
- All 24 skills working
Even though xp count is slow to make it more challenging for the player, and gives the person more sense of achievement.
Active Staff members and server updates atleast once every day to keep the server up to date for your enjoyment!
This is only a small amount of the server, come and explore our wonderful server and enjoy every minute of your stay.
Were knew but growing in size and ready for anything!
Lava Crossing PK zone!
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/210/lavacrossing.jpg/][IMG]http://img210.imageshack.us/img210/8923/lavacrossing.jpg[/img][/URL]
100% Summoning
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/585/summoningo.jpg/][IMG]http://img585.imageshack.us/img585/3325/summoningo.jpg[/img][/URL]
100% Dungeoneering
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/201/dunegoneering.jpg/][IMG]http://img201.imageshack.us/img201/2706/dunegoneering.jpg[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/846/dungeoneering2.jpg/][IMG]http://img846.imageshack.us/img846/4462/dungeoneering2.jpg[/img][/URL]
<snip />
Staff Spots Open:
- Moderator
- Administator

item.title: Chaotic Dream || 100% Dungeoneering & Summoning || Eco/Pk
item.dc:creator: @Code_kai Code kai
item.description:
@Code_kai wrote:

#1 - 98% of those features were part of the “InsidiaX” release

#2 - You only changed the spawns and maybe even the name of some shops (didn’t check)

#3 - Dungeoneering is nowhere near 100%, as long with other half-assed skills such as Hunter and agility (Really? Only one fricking obstacle?!)

#4 - Wrong section.

kthxbai

Read full topic
